meanings.definition: The act of connecting electrical components with wires.
meanings.sent1: The wirings in the robot helped it move smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The wirings in the house needed to be fixed by an electrician.
meanings.sent3: The wirings in the toaster decided to have a party and got all tangled up!
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were like wirings, connecting ideas in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The wirings in his brain sparked with creativity.

meanings.definition: The arrangement of wires in a system or device.
meanings.sent1: The wirings behind the TV were neatly organized.
meanings.sent2: The wirings in the computer were color-coded for easy identification.
meanings.sent3: The wirings in the headphones played a game of hide and seek.
meanings.sent4: The wirings of the city intertwined like a complex web.
meanings.sent5: The wirings in the car were like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
